sections.title: Dirty Macedonian Words and Phrases
sections.instruction: Click the bubbles to see the definitions.

cards.definition: Literally means 'dick.' Commonly used as a vulgar negation meaning 'No way,' 'Zero,' or 'Not a chance.'
cards.example: Тео: "ЛПИ тестот е лесен за мене." Кристијан: "Кур мој, Тео."
cards.english: Theo: "The LPI test is easy for me." Kristijan: "No way [lit: My dick], Theo."

cards.definition: Literally 'I swear by my dick.' It is used to express strong disbelief or sarcasm, equivalent to saying 'Yeah, right' or 'My ass.'
cards.example: Али: "Јас ја напишав домашната работа." Кристијан: "Жими куров."
cards.english: Allie: "I wrote the homework." Kristijan: "Yeah, right."

cards.term: Ај па те барам (Aj pa te baram)
cards.definition: A polite social lie meaning 'Okay, I’ll call you eventually.' It usually implies the conversation is over and there is no actual intention to call.
cards.example: Кристијан: "Часот е крај. Чао студенти. Ај па те барам."
cards.english: Kristijan: "The class is finished. Bye students. I’ll call you eventually."

cards.definition: The act of dressing up nicely or looking sharp, often for a special occasion.
cards.example: Џозеф: "Тојен оди на Пис Корп церемонија. Тој има ново одело. Тоа е пицнување."
cards.english: Josef: "Toyen is going to a Peace Corps ceremony. He has a new suit. That is dressing up sharp."

cards.definition: An idiom meaning 'A greedy ass [equals] a tragedy.' Used to warn someone that being too greedy leads to bad results.
cards.example: Кристијан: "Ми требаат повеќе пари за час." Сара: "Кристијан, лаком г'з трагедија."
cards.english: Kristijan: "I need more money for class." Sara: "Kristijan, greedy ass equals tragedy."

cards.definition: An interjection from the Bitola dialect used to express shock, surprise, disbelief, or awe. The length of the 'o' indicates the level of shock.
cards.english: Kristijan: "Where do you live?" Theo: "In Chashka." Kristijan: "Whoaaaa!"

cards.definition: Literally 'a nap.' Slang for a person, event, or situation that is incredibly boring or low-energy (a 'snooze-fest').
cards.example: Стефани: "Како е Хаб Деј?" Елен: "Лошо. Тешка дремка."
cards.english: Stephanie: "How is Hub Day?" Ellen: "Bad. A heavy nap [Total snooze-fest]."

cards.definition: A 'dirty trick,' 'low blow,' or selfish move done by a friend. (Derived from a slur, but used in slang to describe behavior/actions).
cards.example: Елизабет: "Сара и Лаура одат на кафе без мене. Тоа е педерлук."
cards.english: Elizabeth: "Sara and Laura are going for coffee without me. That is a dirty trick."

cards.definition: Trifles, nonsense, or wasting time on small, unimportant things.
cards.example: Кејти: "На Хаб Деј ние правиме само дрндупки."
cards.english: Katie: "At Hub Day we are only doing nonsense/trifles."

cards.definition: Supplies, expenses, or 'the stuff' needed for an event (often refers to alcohol, food, or party gear).
cards.english: Josef: "We are making a party. We need the supplies."
